name: Trying that again
description:
Join Marion on a little adventure to get the power egg, which gives many possibilites for her, and fear not, with her floating vehicle and her replay glove, you will have a nice adventure too!

                      

Hello, this is a game that I made for the weekly game jam - week 158, which theme is "replay", the reason I put the replay feature on this game, I hope you enjoy this game and I'm very grateful if you play my game.

I'm going to continue making this game later on, with more gameplay and more enemies, weapons, story, characters, levels, etc... but for now, I'm happy for making this, I also had help from 3 friends, Leanduru soucza (L.A.S.S), PITA, and C.S PEDRO and I'm very grateful for them helping me.

Just one more thing, you can't save the progress on the game, so it's highly recommended to complete the game in one sitting.

Well, that's all the time I got, I hope you enjoy the game!
